Localisation.Text: The hat of an adventurer. Seems to give good luck with finding treasure.
Explorers Hat
The focus handed out to apprentice mages. It helps you channel power faster.
Apprentice Focus
The robes of an apprentice mage. Ensorcelled to enhance the speed of spellcasting.
Apprentice Robes
A belt enchanted to add bonus damage to your attacks.
Belt of Strength
These boots make you move and react much faster. Everyone else seems to merely crawl along.
Boots of Speed
A bow and arrow. Great for shooting things.
Bow
A single breastplate, offering high protection from just a single direction. Requires skill to use.
Breastplate
The medal awarded to winners of the Adventurers Tournament. Enchanted with powerful magic. Merchants will give better prices to people wearing this.
Champions Medal
A thick padded jacket, providing minimal protection.
Cloth Jambeson
A golden crown, inlaid with gems. Contains powerful enchantments that gives the wearer great strength.
Crown of Hector
An alchemical flare that can be shot into the air to signal that you need assistance. Another adventurer will surely come to your aid.
Distress Flare
A small ring, covered in sigils. Wearing it makes you feel unnatural energy run through you.
Energy Ring
A necklace enchanted with the power fireshot.
Fireshot Necklace
A wand of fireball with a flaw in it. It takes much more energy than usual to activate.
Flawed Fireball Wand
A set of plate armour that provides excellent protection.
Fullplate
A powerful explosive packed into a hard ceramic shell. Detonates when thrown.
Grenade
A hammer, great for smashing through anything blocking your way.
Hammer
An amulet infused with holy protection.
Holy Amulet
A simple shield, excellent for blocking attacks.
Iron Buckler
Iron gauntlets, providing you with just a little more protection.
Iron Gauntlets
An iron helmet. Tough enough to protect your head.
Iron Helm
A short knife, one of the most versatile tools. This one has been sharpened to have a wicked point.
Knife
Hardened leather armour, flexible yet still offering protection.
Leather Armour
A long blade, kept sharp through careful maintenance and powerful enchantments.
Longsword
A glove imbued with an enchantment that turns normal items into gold.
Midas Glove
A dark and powerful spell. Deals more damage depending on how many creatures are within its area of effect.
Necroracia
Your lack of clothing aids your mobility to the point you can just roll away from any attack. It's not the most flattering look though.
No Pants
A pitchfork, normally used for moving hay. Serves as a useful weapon for any angry peasant.
Pitchfork
A bandoleer of potions, filled with all kinds of elixirs.
Potion Bandoleer
An amulet thrumming with power. Enhances your abilities.
Power Amulet
This little ring constantly heals your wounds, sealing cuts in mere seconds.
Ring of Regeneration
A saucepan, in a pinch it can serve as a passable helmet. Well, it fits on your head anyway.
Saucepan
The lid of a saucepan. The main combat it has seen is against a particularly nasty stew, but sure, it'll make a great shield.
Saucepan Lid
The staff of a goblin shaman.
Shamans Staff
A scimitar, faintly glowing with a purple sheen. Its edge is unnaturally sharp.
Shear Scimitar
A necklace of finely carved skulls. Balefire glows from within their empty eye sockets.
Skull Necklace
A heavy sledgehammer. Slow and heavy but allows you to smash almost anything.
Sledgehammer
A spell that fires three energy bolts that home in on enemies.
Spell: Magic Missile
A spell that summons a magic shield to reflect attacks.
Spell: Reflect
A spell that summons a magic shield that blocks some attacks, and shocks the attackers.
Spell: Shock Shield
Armour covered in vicious spikes. You can swing your body to deliver cuts to your foe.
Spiked Armour
A spiked helmet. With this you can deliver a vicious headbutt.
Spiked Helmet
You know what's better than one shield? Two shields! The best defence is a great defence after-all.
Spiked Shield
A burning torch, great for lighting up places and setting fire to things.
Torch
This paint drives you into a combat frenzy, lending great power to your attacks. However, it doesn't provide any cover at all. You'll be completely exposed.
Warpaint
A whip. In the hands of a skilled practitioner it can be a painful weapon.
Whip
The robes of a mage. Ensorcelled to enhance the speed and power of spellcasting.
Wizards Robes
A giant, heavy blade. Makes you slow but a single hit from this beast will ruin anyone's day.
Zweihander
